page.title: 14Clubs
page.content: Since the Jubilee celebrations a very thriving Community Association has developed, meetings of different types are held, social events such as skittles evenings,barn dances and Village fete. A two or three monthly newsletter is delivered to every house in Little Aston to keep residents in touch with local happenings. Little Aston is twinned with St Georges sur Baulches,France.Annual village exchanges have led to great friendship between the villages and surely to greater international understanding. Two Women's Institutes belong to the Staffordshire Federation and enjoy very varied programmes. Other clubs include Lacemaking, Mothers and Toddlers, and Scouts, Guides, Cubs and Brownies.
